There are four majors being provided in the program including international relations (030207H), regional economics (urban and regional planning) (020202H), environment management, and economic (environmental management)(0830z1H), and English language and literature (050201H). As an Nankai University-NEOMA Buisness School Joint Education Program for Double Bachelor Degree in E-Commerce&International BusinessNankai University-Flinders University Joint Education Program for Master of Educational Leadership and ManagementThe educational program about Master of Educational Leadership and Management, organized by Nankai University and Flinders University together, is very famous and renowned among similar cooperative educational programs in China, just like the MBA in the field of education. This program was approved by the Ministry of Education of the People’s Republic of China in 2011 and began to enroll students in 2012.Link for Chinese-Foreign cooperation in Running Schools: http://www.crs.jsj.edu.cn/aproval/dNankai University-Flinders University Joint Education Program for Master of Arts International Relations in Economy and TradeThe educational program about Master of Arts (International Relations in Economy and Trade), organized by Nankai University and Flinders University together, is very famous and renowned among similar cooperative educational programs in China. This program was approved by the Ministry of Education of the People’s Republic of China in 1999 and began to enroll students in 2000.Link for Chinese-Foreign Cooperation in Running Schools: http://www.crs.jsj.edu.cn/aproval/detail/372MissionNankai UniversiNankai University-Flinders University Joint Education Program for Master of Hospital AdministrationThe educational program about the Master of Hospital Administration, organized by Nankai University and Flinders University together, is the only Chinese-foreign cooperative program to train the master in this subject area in China. This program was approved by the Ministry of Education of the People’s Republic of China in 2002 and began to enroll students in 2003.Link for Chinese-Foreign Cooperation in Running Schools: http://www.crs.jsj.edu.cn/aproval/detail/372MissionNankai University is a ke38 Tongyan Road, Jinnan District, Tianjin, P.R.China 300350 94 Weijin Road, Nankai District, Tianjin, P.R.China Joint Graduate School is win-win cooperation between Nankai University and the University of Glasgow.The Joint Graduate School began enrolling full-time postgraduates in 2015. There are four majors being provided in the program including international relations (030207H), regional economics (urban and regional planning) (020202H), environment management, and economic (environmental management)(0830z1H), and English language and literature (050201H). As an Nankai University-NEOMA Buisness School Joint Education Program for Double Bachelor Degree in E-Commerce&International BusinessNankai University-Flinders University Joint Education Program for Master of Educational Leadership and ManagementThe educational program about Master of Educational Leadership and Management, organized by Nankai University and Flinders University together, is very famous and renowned among similar cooperative educational programs in China, just like the MBA in the field of education.
